Translations.Text: mema granthaye pahala kirima maha pragnavanta sarva baladhariyanan vu allahgeni
niyata vasayenma ahas ha mahapolovehi deviyan visvasa karannanhata samgna æta
numbala mævimehi da satvayin ohu visuruva æti akarayehi da taraye visvasa karana janayata samgna æta
ratriya ha dahavala venasvimehi da, allah ahasin posana sampat pahala kota mahapolava miya giya pasu emagin eya nævata pranavat kirimehi da, sulam hæmimehi da, vataha ganna janayata samgnavan æta
eva allahge vadan ve. api obata eva satyayen yutu va parayanaya kara penvamu. eheyin allah ha ohuge vadan valata pasu va kavara prakasayak ovuhu visvasa karanno da
sæma maha borukara papatarayakutama vinasaya at veva

ohu veta kiyava penvana lada allahge vadan valata ohu savan deyi. pasu va ohu eyata savan nodunnak men udanguven hituvakkara lesa hæsireyi. eheyin vedaniya danduvama pilibanda va (nabitumani!) oba ohuta subharamci denu
ohu apage vadan aturin kisivak ho dæna gat vita eya ohu vihiluvata gatteya. ninda sahagata danduvamak taman satu kara gatto ovuhumaya
ovunata pasupasin niraya æta. ovuhu kavara deyak upaya gatte da eya ho allahgen tora va ovuhu bharakaruvan lesa gat dæ ho ovunata phalak novanu æta. tavada ovunata mahat danduvamak æta
meya yaha margayayi. tavada ovunge paramadhipatige vadan pratiksepa kalavun vana ovunata ita darunu vedana gena dena danduvam æta
